titleInfo.title: Evolutionary change and lawlikeness: Beatty on biological generalizations
Concepts, theories, and rationality in the biological sciences: the second Pittsburgh-Konstanz Colloquium in the Philosophy of Science, University of Pittsburgh, October 1 - 4, 1993

bibliographicCitation.aps: M.
